Package engine.gameCharacters.abstractGameCharacter

Class GameCharacterStateOnFloor

java.lang.Object
engine.gameCharacters.abstractGameCharacter.GameCharacterState
engine.gameCharacters.abstractGameCharacter.GameCharacterStateOnFloor
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameCharacterStateIddle, GameCharacterStateWalking
public abstract class GameCharacterStateOnFloor extends GameCharacterState
Author:
Guillermo Lazzurri Clase abstracta que representa el estado de estar en el piso. Podra extenderse a GameCharacterStateIddle, o GameCharacterStateWalking
